title: The Unexpected Gate: Chapter 1-“The Journey Begins”
description: Two Brave girls Jack and Marshal was planning to spend their summer holidays in an old library near their house, they ended their first day of vacation by finding an mysterious book at the backyard of library. The unexpected gate is opened through that book and it leads them to an another mysterious world, where they unfold the mystery lies behind this gate. Unfortunately they woke up the devil and evils, who was locked into this book by the king Jeyos. Their journey begins with an dangerous start and it takes them to find some good friends in this world. They need ancient fantus sword to wake up the king to solve this trouble created by them. Can Jack and Marshall forsee the hidden meaning in this mystery world?Will they find the fantus sword and wakeup the king? Will they save these innocent people? Can they lock the devil back to book and will they safely come out of this book? Join the journey of Jack and Marshal duo and explore the world, unfold the secrets.
author: Saravanan Shanmugam
